Text.Value: Of course. How else was I to break through these walls?
A miniature giant space hamster. Fear not, you will learn the difference in time.
You gaze into Minsc's soul and see his foul crimes! You smell the stench of evil upon him, pointy claws primed, ready to scratch out his eyes!
Can I trust you not to turn on me again, Stone Lord?
Now we are together again, all will be exactly as -
I do trust you. I think.
Minsc finds that the less thinking he does, the easier the trusting comes.
*Continued squeaking.*
Not enough. You're on your own - I don't need your help.

EditorData.stateContext: Minsc is holding boo in his left hand, upper chest level

Text.Value: Good enough for me. Let's go.
What is it? A rat?
To glory, or glorious death.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Clearing throat and back to hero mode.
EditorData.NodeContext: Clearing throat and back to hero mode. Glory and glorious death are equally noble.

Text.Value: You have a great many companions already. There is no room for little Boo, or slightly larger Minsc.
Fine. I'll find you at camp.

EditorData.stateContext: Minsc on knees, speaking to something in his cupped hands

Text.Value: As you wish. But Boo and I hope you will change your mind - before the worm changes it for you, eh?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crawl on his shoulder and in his armour

Text.Value: Your party remains full, and Boo is shy. But we shall sniff out your camp and meet you there.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crawl on his shoulder and in his armour
Shot of Jaheira, who gives a weary shrug: 'humour him'
EditorData.NodeContext: Line for mocap. Just a slight exasperated sigh and a shrug from Jaheira - Minsc is being odd, player looks to Jaheira, who shrugs wearily as if to say "humour him"

Text.Value: This is your great beast? Did you hit your head, by any chance?
But none like this! Whatever happens, show no fear, and stay your hand. Trust in Minsc!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Minsc poised with his hand up, looking around as if expecting attack at any moment.
EditorData.NodeContext: In a stage whisper, as if we're somewhere incredibly dangerous

Text.Value: No - it is a hamster.
Such boundless compassion! You are all heart! And whiskers. And cute little nose.
...Once more, my hamster proves himself my greater half, and makes the path clear when my mind is fuzzier than his tiny bottom.

EditorData.stateContext: Minsc standing as default, Boo is concealed in his armour

Text.Value: Why don't you wait at my camp instead? I have things to do.
If you will not be swayed, I will thank you - and go to find Jaheira. She knows the value of a hamster at hand.
...All right. Then I suppose all that remains is for us to thank you - and wish luck to us all.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little taken aback that we don't want her or Minsc

Text.Value: You are right, of course. There is still much evil for Boo and Minsc to stamp out - but we need not fight it alone!
WAIT!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Hands over his face, flailing. He falls to his knees dramatically, his back turned to us. He converses with something held in his cupped hands.

Text.Value: No? You are certain?
Such a hurry to our final moments. May I face death as bravely as you do.
I have a new face to show you. But it is not a villainous one for the clawing, understand?
Secure your rodent and follow me.
He says we will join with you, and cleanse Baldur's Gate of evil together!
...*Squeak.*
You, this is Boo. And Boo - meet you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Minsc turns around and spreads his hands out to player - revealing Boo, looking at us intently. 

Minsc is holding boo in his left hand, upper chest level after the presentation
EditorData.NodeContext: Turns 180 degree while holding a hamster close to his chest, then spread his hands out. <TarikS>

Text.Value: *Squeak!*
Truly? But... you have seen my hamster, have you not? His stern countenance, his mighty claws, his pointy teeth!
Boo. Why do you use such language?
*Continued angry squeaking.*
You can cleanse it on your own. I don't need your help.
It is an honour.
Go to my camp. I have things to do first.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Minsc] Walk few steps then stop, raise his right hand as a sign to stop <TasikS>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Minsc and player enter a low dark room. Minsc holds up a hand (the right one), suddenly cautious. He speaks in a stage whisper.

Text.Value: Go, Minsc - and take Jaheira with you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Minsc steps into the centre of the room ...and then STAGGERS as if struck with some force.

Text.Value: You can go to my camp. I have things to do.
For every song of Minsc the ranger, they sing ten of the hamster Boo. And not just because his name is easier for the rhyming.
If this is a trap, you die first.
It would be an honour - let's go.
My friend - only cowards lay traps, and Minsc is no coward, so there can be no trap. Yes?
I did not come so far only to leave him to the mercy of the tadpole again. I'd ask you to reconsider - send him to camp, at least. He will prove useful, despite all appearances.

EditorData.NodeContext: Gently chiming in on Minsc's behalf, but making it clear she won't leave him behind.

Text.Value: I am sorry, my friend! I am at the mercy of your faultless justice!
To camp, then! For his heroics here today, Boo has earned the most vigorous of back-scratchings.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crawl on his shoulder and in his armour

Text.Value: I hope this brings you comfort.
Boo and I are most adept in the doing of things. But, as you wish.
You are not the leader of this merry band, I think. Meaning no offence - Boo is the boss of me, after all.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crawl on his shoulder and in his armour

Text.Value: Now: if you must burrow through my blackened heart - I am ready.
I give you my solemn vow - should any of us show signs of weakening to the worm, or any other evil, Boo will slaughter us all in our beds.
*Squeak!*
Those villains locked Boo away, lest his righteous gaze cause their tadpole to flee in terror.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [JC][REUSE] BOO_Rig_DFLT_IDLE_Still_Peace_01 <- to use CINE converted ones.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Boo rinsing himself disinterestedly, very much just a hamster. [Existing idle]

Text.Value: My friend. From our brief sharing of skulls, I know you have faced many strange beings.
On second thought - better we part ways here.
Can we just get on with... whatever this is?
Get comfortable, Boo. We go to battle, and - ahahaha!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Boo] *Keyframe* Transfered from hand to shoulder. Crawls inside his armour <TarikS>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Minsc transfers Boo to his shoulder and strikes a pose, declaiming heroically - then breaks down giggling when Boo crawls inside his armour. 

Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crawl on his shoulder and in his armour and strikes a pose, then laugh
EditorData.NodeContext: Puts the Hamster on his right shoulder (collar bone level) with his left hand, let Boo crwl on his shoulder and in his armour and strikes a pose, then laugh. <TarikS>

Synopsis: After being freed from the Absolute's thrall, Minsc tears his lair apart in the search for Boo. He eventually leads us to a small chamber that had been bricked up, and cautiously creeps in - warning us that it is the lair of a dangerous beast (Boo.)
